name: The King of Fighters 2002
description: This is the GOG version of The King of Fighters 2002.

files.goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer
game:
  exe: start.sh
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/GOG
    file: goginstaller
    format: zip
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/GOG/data/noarch/
